description: As the afternoon sun begins to set, King Arad retires to his quarters to take relief from the heat and re-charge for the night's events. He calls his servant in, and the young blonde attendant, dutiful and prompt, proceeds to rub his master down with fine smelling oils and perfumes, washing his feet and massaging his royal back, then working under Arad's sash, he feels the royal member swell and grow in his hand. Arad looks down at his servant, who looks up at him with imploring blue eyes, and begins to disrobe, dropping his robe to the ground as he stands glistening and naked before the young slave. The slave abides, taking the King into his mouth on cue, and swallowing him whole, down to the last inch. Arad feels a passion for this servant unlike any other he's ever experienced, and he throws him down against his lounge and returns the favor, before entering the servant from behind, unloading all of his royal tension to his most loyal and beautiful of subjects.Enjoy!
title: Worship of a God
